original_text: ROSEN, A LEADING LAW FIRM, Reminds Raytheon Technologies Corporation f/k/a Raytheon Company Investors of Important Deadline in First Filed Securities Class Action Commenced by the Firm; Encourages Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K to Contact the Firm – RTX, RTN
